20101202010808.500|20101202010811.000|CCO|VIRUS THAT CAUSED AIDS.

20101202010813.000|20101202010815.000|CCO|STILL A LOT OF QUESTIONS, IN 
20101202010815.000|20101202010817.000|CCO|FACT, MORE QUESTIONS THAN THEY 
20101202010817.000|20101202010819.000|CCO|HAVE ANSWERS ON HOW EXACTLY TO 
20101202010819.000|20101202010821.000|CCO|DEFEAT THIS DISEASE.
20101202010821.000|20101202010823.000|CCO|MICHELLE FRANZEN HAS MORE.
20101202010823.000|20101202010825.000|CCO|>> Reporter: THREE DECADES AFTER
20101202010825.000|20101202010827.000|CCO|AIDS WAS DISCOVERED, THE DEADLY 
20101202010827.000|20101202010829.000|CCO|DISEASE REMAINING A PANDEMIC 
20101202010829.000|20101202010831.000|CCO|THREAT.
20101202010831.000|20101202010833.000|CCO|ACCORDING TO A UNITED NATIONS 
20101202010833.000|20101202010835.000|CCO|REPORT 33 MILLION PEOPLE IN THE 
20101202010835.000|20101202010837.000|CCO|WORLD HAVE AIDS.
20101202010837.000|20101202010839.000|CCO|ON WORLD AIDS DAY A HUGE RIBBON 
20101202010839.000|20101202010841.000|CCO|WAS ON DISPLAY AT THE WHITE 
20101202010841.000|20101202010843.000|CCO|HOUSE ALONG WITH A PLEDGE TO 
20101202010843.000|20101202010845.000|CCO|COMBAT AID AND RAISE AWARENESS.

20101202010847.000|20101202010849.000|CCO|ELIMINATE THIS DISEASE FROM THE 
20101202010849.000|20101202010851.000|CCO|FACE OF THE EARTH.
20101202010851.000|20101202010853.000|CCO|>> Reporter: IN THE U.S. MORE 
20101202010853.000|20101202010855.000|CCO|THAN 1 MILLION PEOPLE ARE LIVING
20101202010855.000|20101202010857.000|CCO|WITH HIV, THE VIRUS THAT CAUSES 
20101202010857.000|20101202010859.000|CCO|AIDS.
20101202010859.000|20101202010901.000|CCO|IN CHICAGO SPEAKERS AND THE ART 
20101202010901.000|20101202010903.000|CCO|OF RAP HELPED RAISE AWARENESS.
20101202010903.000|20101202010905.000|CCO|ALONG WITH EDUCATION, ROUTINE 
20101202010905.000|20101202010907.000|CCO|TESTING AND PREVENTION REMAIN 
20101202010907.000|20101202010909.000|CCO|THE FOCUS.
20101202010909.000|20101202010911.000|CCO|THE CENTERS FOR DISEASE CONTROL 
20101202010911.000|20101202010913.000|CCO|AND PREVENTION SHOWS NEARLY 83 
20101202010913.000|20101202010915.000|CCO|MILLION AMERICANS HAVE BEEN 
20101202010915.000|20101202010917.000|CCO|TESTED FOR THE AIDS VIRUS.
20101202010917.000|20101202010919.000|CCO|IN THE MEDICAL WORLD NEW DRUGS 
20101202010919.000|20101202010921.000|CCO|OFFER HOPE FOR MANY.
